title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the basics of C programming language from scratch. Covering variables, control flow, functions, and memory management.
headline: C Programming

title: Introduction to Algorithm
description: Master the art of designing and analyzing algorithms. Explore sorting, searching, and graph algorithms with real-world examples.
headline: Algorithm

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Utilize C++ for implementing efficient data structures and algorithms. Covers object-oriented concepts, templates, and STL.
headline: C++ for DSA

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Explore various data structures and their applications. Includes arrays, linked lists, trees, and hash tables with practical exercises.
headline: Data Structures

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Learn object-oriented programming principles using Python. Dive into classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and design patterns.
headline: OOP Python

title: Software Engineering
description: Understand the principles and practices of software engineering. Covers requirements engineering, software design, and testing methodologies.
headline: Software Engineering

title: AWS Cloud Computing
description: Get hands-on experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud computing. Covers EC2, S3, Lambda, and deployment strategies.
headline: AWS Cloud Computing

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Learn database management with MySQL. Covers SQL basics, database design, normalization, and transactions.
headline: Database (MySQL)

title: Problem Solving Part
description: Sharpen your problem-solving skills through practice and techniques. Learn problem-solving strategies, algorithms, and optimization techniques.
headline: Problem Solving Part
